title: Blac Chyna ignores Kardashian lawsuit drama for swanky Halloween party
text:
Blac Chyna ignored all the drama for a swanky Halloween party (Picture: Backgrid)

Blac Chyna is currently embroiled in a lawsuit with the Kardashian-Jenner family, over her axed TV series Rob & Chyna.

But the 31-year-old put all the drama out of her mind as she rocked up to a Halloween party on Tuesday.

In fact, the mum-of-two went all out for the bash – held at Highlight Room in LA – jumping straight into the scary theme.

She rocked a black velvet jumpsuit on the night, with black studded sheer gloves and strappy heels.

In a bid to make her look a little spookier, she added a headdress with a huge white skull, coupled with a sunflower, and some heavy make-up on her chest and around her eyes.

We’re not entirely sure what Chyna was going for, but she made it work.

We’re not entirely sure what she was meant to dress up as (Picture: Backgrid)

Her outing comes as her lawsuit with the Kardashian-Jenner family rumbles on, after her reality series was axed after one season.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In legal documents filed by the reality star, she claimed the Keeping Up With The Kardashians stars were behind the decision to pull the plug on her own E! show, something they have fiercely denied.

They are set to hash it out in court next year.

However, Chyna’s relationship with ex Rob Kardashian – whom she shares daughter Dream with – is on the up.

Chyna and Rob share daughter Dream together (Picture: Getty)

Earlier this year, the 32-year-old hit out at claims about their co-parenting stance, amid reports he refused to go for a drink with her after a settlement meeting.

Taking to Twitter, he said: ‘Angela the mother of my child whom I have a wonderful relationship with decided to drop the child support case because she felt it was in the best interest of our daughter.

‘Reports of her wanting to have drinks was totally false and her being in late was in reference to a prior meeting concerning our daughter.

‘Please stop creating all these falsehoods concerning Angela and I.’

So, that’s that then.

description: Blac Chyna is embroiled in a lawsuit with the Kardashians over axed TV series Rob & Chyna. The 31-year-old ignored drama for Halloween party
